name: Supra Mayro 64 Fan Made CHRISTMAS!
description:
A Mayrotastic 3d very amazing game with awesome and epic levels!

SOME FANTASTIC LEVELS!

-Rob Bob battlethingy

-Wump's House

-Lava Land

-Snow Land

-Snow Land Slide

-Princes's Ultra Secret Slide

-Boo's Weird House

-Booser in the thingy

-SANDBOX MODE

AND ALSO SOME SMALL TREATS!

-Sandbox Mode!

-Minigames!

-Easter Eggs!

Orginal Mayro Games Creator
